title: Notice of resignation of a director
head_office_address: No. 12 Ihama Road, G.R.A, Benin City, Edo State
detailed_summary:
### Summary of Corporate Disclosure Document

#### Purpose and Nature of the Disclosure
This document serves as a formal announcement regarding the resignation of a director from Ellah Lakes Plc. It provides essential details about the resignation and the subsequent actions the company will undertake.

#### Key Dates
- **Resignation Date**: Hauwa Nuru resigned effective September 19, 2023.
- **Announcement Date**: The resignation was publicly announced on September 20, 2023.

#### Director Information
- **Resigning Director**: Hauwa Nuru
  - **New Position**: Honourable Commissioner for Finance of Kwara State.
  
#### Company Information
- **Company Name**: Ellah Lakes Plc
- **Head Office Address**: No. 12 Ihama Road, G.R.A, Benin City, Edo State
- **Registration Number**: RC No: 34296
- **Website**: www.ellahlakes.com
- **Contact Email**: info@ellahlakes.com

#### Board of Directors
The document lists the current members of the Board of Directors:
- Olumide Akpata
- Chuka Mordi
- Shehu Abubakar
- Osaro Oyegun
- Evans Jakpa-Johns
- Maxwell Oko
- Nnenna Onyewuchi
- Enotie Ogbebor
- Chijioke Dozie
- Hauwa Nuru (resigned)
- Joe Attueyi
- Charles Anajemba

#### Acknowledgment
The Board and management express gratitude to Hauwa Nuru for her service to the company.

#### Future Actions
- The company has initiated the process to fill the vacancy left by Hauwa Nuru's resignation.
- Further communication will be provided once the Board confirms a replacement.

#### Signatory
- **Signed by**: Olumoroti Alli
- **Position**: Company Secretary, OAKE Legal

This summary encapsulates all significant information from the corporate disclosure document regarding the resignation of a director at Ellah Lakes Plc.
